title: 115A.1458 ANTICOMPETITIVE CONDUCT.
text: A producer responsibility organization that arranges collection, recycling, composting, waste reduction, or reuse services under sections 115A.144 to 115A.1463 may engage in anticompetitive conduct to the extent necessary to plan and implement collection, recycling, composting, waste reduction, or reuse systems to meet the obligations under sections 115A.144 to 115A.1463, and is immune from liability under state laws relating to antitrust, restraint of trade, and unfair trade practices.
